Title: Meinertzhagen's Haversack
Writer: Adam Countee, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Richard searches for a way around Jack; Gilfoyle opens himself up to recruiters; Dinesh draws unwanted attention from a recent purchase.
